thread.title: Aeromexico Reports August 2015 Traffic ResultsTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Aeromexico Reports August 2015 Traffic ResultsTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Aeromexico Reports August 2015 Traffic Results
Grupo Aeromexico S.A.B. de C.V. today reported August 2015 operational results.
Grupo Aeromexico transported 1 million 670 thousand passengers in August; a 7.1% year-on-year increase. International passenger numbers increased by 17.6%, while domestic passenger numbers increased by 2.2%. Demand, measured in Revenue Passenger Kilometers (RPKs), increased by 10.1%, year-on-year. Aeromexico’s capacity, measured in Available Seat Kilometers (ASKs), increased by 9.3% year-on-year. Aeromexico’s August load factor was 82.9%.

The information included within this report has not been audited and does not provide information on the Company’s future performance. Aeromexico’s future performance depends on many factors and it cannot be inferred that any period’s performance or its year-over-year comparison will be an indicator of similar future performance.
